summary.span: 包含如何在呈現期間操作點陣圖和中繼檔色彩的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about how bitmap and metafile colors are manipulated during rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護數個彩色調整設定，包括彩色調整矩陣、 灰階調整矩陣、 gamma 修正值、 色彩對應資料表，以及色彩臨界值。An object maintains several color-adjustment settings, including color-adjustment matrices, grayscale-adjustment matrices, gamma-correction values, color-map tables, and color-threshold values. 在呈現期間，色彩可以更正、 調暗、 淡化，並移除。During rendering, colors can be corrected, darkened, lightened, and removed. 若要套用這類的操作，初始化物件，並將該路徑物件 (連同的路徑) 至方法。To apply such manipulations, initialize an object and pass the path of that object (along with the path of an ) to the method. ## Examples 下列範例會為所有的一種色彩 （0.2、 0.0、 0.4、 1.0） 的映像和雙精度浮點數的紅色元件加入 0.2 紅色、 綠色和藍色元件The following example takes an image that is all one color (0.2, 0.0, 0.4, 1.0) and doubles the red component adds 0.2 to the red, green, and blue components 下圖顯示在右側的原始左側映像，而且已轉換的映像。The following illustration shows the original image on the left and the transformed image on the right. ![色彩](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "色彩")![Colors](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "Colors") 下列範例中的程式碼會使用下列步驟執行重新著色，以便：The code in the following example uses the following steps to perform the recoloring: 1. 初始化物件。Initialize a object. 2. 建立物件，並傳遞物件方法物件。Create an object and pass the object to the method of the object. 3. 傳遞物件方法物件。Pass the object to the method of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.RecoloringImages#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RecoloringImages/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.RecoloringImages#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.RecoloringImages/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍筆刷分類不同的色彩重新對應表。For example, you can specify one color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the brush category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 例如，如果您不指定任何筆刷分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至筆刷分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the brush category, the default settings apply to the brush category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定的預設重新對應表轉換為綠色、 紅色，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。For example, suppose you specify a default remap table that converts red to green, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8. 如果您呼叫方法，因此預設重新對應表 （紅色綠色） 及預設 gamma 值 (1.8) 不會套用到筆刷。If you call the method, the default remap table (red to green) and the default gamma value (1.8) will not apply to brushes. 如果您稍後呼叫方法，筆刷分類不會還原成預設值重新對應表; 相反地，筆刷分類會有任何重新對應表。If you later call the method, the brush category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the brush category will have no remap table. 同樣地，筆刷分類不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，筆刷分類會有任何 gamma 值。Similarly, the brush category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the brush category will have no gamma value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定預設色彩索引鍵，讓紅色元件 200 到 255 之間的任何色彩變成透明，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。For example, suppose you specify a default color key that makes any color with a red component from 200 through 255 transparent, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8. 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的色彩索引鍵方法、 預設的色彩索引鍵和預設 gamma 值不會套用至畫筆。If you set the color key of the pen category by calling the method, the default color key and the default gamma value will not apply to pens. 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除的畫筆色彩索引鍵方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的色彩索引鍵; 相反地，畫筆分類將沒有色彩索引鍵。If you later clear the pen color key by calling the method, the pen category will not revert to the default color key; rather, the pen category will have no color key. 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定在輸出通道和預設分類調整矩陣。For example, suppose you specify an output channel and an adjustment matrix for the default category. 如果您藉由呼叫設定輸出色頻點陣圖分類方法，則預設輸出通道不會套用至點陣圖。If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by calling the method, the default output channel will not apply to bitmaps. 如果您稍後清除點陣圖藉由呼叫的輸出通道方法中，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設輸出通道，而是點陣圖分類必須沒有輸出色頻設定。If you later clear the bitmap output channel by calling the method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel setting. 同樣地，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設的彩色調整矩陣。相反地，點陣圖分類會有任何彩色調整矩陣。Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的輸出通道的設定檔和點陣圖分類不同的輸出通道的設定檔。For example, you can specify an output channel profile for the default category and a different output channel profile for the bitmap category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定的輸出通道的設定檔和預設分類調整矩陣。For example, suppose you specify an output channel profile and an adjustment matrix for the default category. 如果您藉由呼叫設定點陣圖分類的輸出通道設定檔方法，則預設輸出通道的設定檔不會套用至點陣圖。If you set the output channel profile for the bitmap category by calling the method, the default output channel profile will not apply to bitmaps. 如果您稍後清除點陣圖輸出通道設定檔，藉由呼叫方法中，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設輸出通道的設定檔; 相反地，點陣圖分類將任何輸出色頻設定檔設定。If you later clear the bitmap output channel profile by calling the method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel profile; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel profile setting. 同樣地，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設的彩色調整矩陣。相反地，點陣圖分類會有任何彩色調整矩陣。Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的重新對應表。For example, you can specify a remap table for the default category, a different remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different remap table for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定的重新對應表及預設分類的 gamma 值。For example, suppose you specify a remap table and a gamma value for the default category. 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的重新對應表方法，預設重新對應表不會套用至畫筆。If you set the remap table for the pen category by calling the method, the default remap table will not apply to pens. 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆重新對應表方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設值重新對應表; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何重新對應表。If you later clear the pen remap table by calling the method, the pen category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the pen category will have no remap table. 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearThreshold() cil managed

summary.span: 清除預設分類的閾值。

span.span: Clears the threshold value for the default category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component. 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively. 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity). 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0. 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值，不同的臨界值的點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類的不同臨界值。For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a different threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。For example, you can specify a color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 當您呼叫方法，您可以指定用來調整調色盤色彩的調整類別。When you call the method, you can specify the adjustment category that is used to adjust the palette colors. 例如，如果您傳遞至方法中，點陣圖類別目錄的設定用來調整調色盤色彩的調整。For example, if you pass to the method, the adjustment settings of the bitmap category are used to adjust the palette colors.

summary.span: 設定筆刷分類的色彩重新對應表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 色彩重新對應表是陣列結構。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每個結構有兩個物件： 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 呼叫方法已傳遞相同的效果至方法。Calling the method has the same effect as passing to the method. 指定的重新對應表適用於使用筆刷填滿的中繼檔中的項目。The specified remap table applies to items in metafiles that are filled with a brush. 這個方法僅只用於中繼檔。This method is intended to be used only with metafiles. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 建立單一項目保留舊的色彩為紅色和綠色 做為新的色彩的陣列。Creates a single-element array that holds red as the old color and green as the new color. 2. 將此陣列傳遞至新建立物件。Passes this array to a newly created object. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法設定的最高和最低色彩索引鍵的值，使其可以進行透明的色彩範圍。This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent. 任何色彩，其三個元件 （紅色、 綠色、 藍色） 之間的對應元件的高低的色彩索引鍵的每個進行透明。Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For a code example, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般值`gamma`參數會從 1.0 2.2; 不過，從 0.1 到 5.0 的值無法證明在某些情況下很有用。Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 一般範圍以外的 gamma 值可能是適用於舊的 CRT 監視器或監視器的不尋常的光源的狀況，例如工業環境或視窗會顯示。Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此外，您需要將影像檔案路徑變更為您系統上有效的路徑和映像名稱。In addition, you need to change the image file path to a path and image name valid on your system. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 開啟，使用 「 檔案 Camera.jpg 和繪製到螢幕的 gamma 使用預設值。Opens an that uses the file Camera.jpg and draws it to the screen using the default value for gamma. 2. 建立物件，並設定其 gamma 藉由呼叫 2.2方法。Creates an object and sets its gamma to 2.2 by calling the method. 3. 影像 (第二個 camera) 繪製到螢幕使用只在設定 gamma 值物件。Draws the image (a second camera) to the screen using the gamma value just set in the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法將影像轉換成 CMYK 色彩空間，並檢查其中一個 CMYK 色彩頻道的強度。You can use the method to convert an image to a CMYK color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels. 例如，假設您建立物件，並設定其點陣圖輸出通道為。For example, suppose you create an object and set its bitmap output channel to . 如果您要傳入的路徑物件方法，會計算青色元件的每個像素，而且所呈現影像的每個像素深淺程度的灰色，表示其青色通道的濃度。If you pass the path of that object to the method, the cyan component of each pixel is calculated, and each pixel in the rendered image is a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel. 同樣地，您可以呈現影像，以指出洋紅色、 黃色及黑色通道的強度。Similarly, you can render images that indicate the intensities of the magenta, yellow, and black channels. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼入 Windows Form 中的下列程式碼。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`ShowOutputChannels`，並傳遞`e`為。Handle the form's event and call `ShowOutputChannels`, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用和方法將影像轉換成 CMYK （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 色彩空間，並檢查其中一個 CMYK 的強度色彩頻道。You can use the and methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels. 例如，假設您撰寫程式碼會執行下列步驟：For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1. 建立。Create an . 2. 建立物件。Create an object. 3. 傳遞至方法物件。Pass to the method of the object. 4. 傳遞至的色彩設定檔的路徑名稱方法物件。Pass the path name of a color profile file to the method of the object. 5. 傳遞的路徑和物件加入至方法。Pass the paths of the and objects to the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 將用來計算青色元件的映像，在每個像素的色彩設定檔，並呈現影像的每個像素會成為陰影灰色，表示其青色通道的濃度。 will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定輸出色頻色彩設定檔案的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻色彩設定檔檔案。For example, you can specify an output channel color-profile file for the default category and a different output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用和方法將影像轉換成 CMYK （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 色彩空間，並檢查其中一個 CMYK 的強度色彩頻道。You can use the and methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels. 例如，假設您撰寫程式碼會執行下列步驟：For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1. 建立。Create an . 2. 建立物件。Create an object. 3. 傳遞至方法物件。Pass to the method of the object. 4. 傳遞至的色彩設定檔的路徑名稱方法物件。Pass the path name of a color profile file to the method of the object. 5. 傳遞的路徑和物件加入至方法。Pass the paths of the and objects to the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 將用來計算青色元件的映像，在每個像素的色彩設定檔，並呈現影像的每個像素會成為陰影灰色，表示其青色通道的濃度。 will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定輸出色頻色彩設定檔案的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻色彩設定檔檔案。For example, you can specify an output channel color-profile file for the default category and a different output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category. 如果您藉由傳遞設定輸出色頻色彩設定檔檔案，如點陣圖分類至方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用至點陣圖。If you set the output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category by passing to the method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to bitmaps.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetRemapTable(class System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap[] map) cil managed

param.name: map
param.span: 型別的色彩配對陣列。

span.span: An array of color pairs of type .

param.span: 每個色彩配對包含現有色彩 (第一個值) 和現有色彩所要對應至的色彩 (第二個值)。

summary.span: 設定預設分類的色彩重新對應表。

span.span: Sets the color-remap table for the default category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 色彩重新對應表是陣列結構。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每個結構有兩個物件： 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定色彩重新對應預設分類、 [點陣圖] 類別中，色彩重新對應表和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 建立 （紅色圓形） 的映像、 將其儲存為 Circle2.jpg、 開啟該映像，及繪製到螢幕。Creates an image (a red circle), saves it as Circle2.jpg, opens that image, and draws it to the screen. 2. 建立會對應至綠色的色彩為紅色的色彩對應。Creates a color map that maps the color red to the color green. 3. 繪製到螢幕一次，但這次使用的色彩對應稍早建立的映像。Draws the image created earlier to the screen again, but this time using the color map. remarks.format: ## Remarks 色彩重新對應表是陣列結構。A color-remap table is an array of structures. 每個結構有兩個物件： 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。Each structure has two objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color. 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定色彩重新對應預設分類、 [點陣圖] 類別中，色彩重新對應表和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category. 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category. 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的色彩重新對應表至方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。If you set the color-remap table for the pen category by passing to the method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For a code example, see the method.

summary.span: 設定閾值 (透明度範圍)。

span.span: Sets the threshold (transparency range).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetThreshold(float32 threshold) cil managed

param.name: threshold
param.span: 指定閾值的實數。

span.span: A real number that specifies the threshold value.

summary.span: 設定預設分類的閾值 (透明度範圍)。

span.span: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for the default category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component. 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively. 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity). 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0. 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255. 物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。An object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text. 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的臨界值和仍然畫筆分類的不同臨界值。For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category. 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own. 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 開啟並將它繪製到螢幕。Opens an and draws it to the screen. 2. 建立物件，並設定其臨界值使用方法。Creates an object and sets its threshold by using the method. 3. 繪製至畫面的影像所使用的臨界值物件。Draws the image to the screen by using the threshold of the object. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImaging.ImageAttributes/VB/form1.vb#7)]

Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For a code example, see the method.

param.span: 的元素，指定如何使用重複的影像複本來並排填滿區域。

span.span: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法相當於呼叫和傳遞如`color`參數。Calling the method is equivalent to calling and passing for the `color` parameter. 指定的呈現影像外部的像素的色彩。 specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image. 此色彩時，會顯示模式參數設定為來源矩形傳遞至方法大於影像本身。This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to and the source rectangle passed to the method is larger than the image itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 開啟Circle3.jpg 從檔案 （小型的填滿紅色圓形），並將它繪製到螢幕。Opens an from the Circle3.jpg file (a small, red-filled circle) and draws it to the screen. 2. 建立物件，然後設定列舉。Creates an object and sets the enumeration to . 3. 建立Circle3.jpg 檔案中使用的映像。Creates a using the image from the Circle3.jpg file. 4. 螢幕填滿小型的紅色填滿的圓形繪製的矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen that is filled with the small, red-filled circles.
